Module org.nasdanika.common
Package org.nasdanika.common

Interface Command

Record Components:
C - context type.
T - result type.
All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Diagnosable, ExecutionParticipant, ExecutionParticipantInfo
All Known Implementing Classes:
CompoundCommand, ContextifiedExecutionParticipant.ContextifiedCommand, FilterCommand
public interface Command extends ExecutionParticipant, ExecutionParticipantInfo
Command executes with ProgressMonitor and returns no result.
Author:
Pavel Vlasov
